alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 3:14PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Nassau, southern Camden and east central Charlton Counties through 345 PM EST... At 314 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Fernandina Beach to near Kings Ferry. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Fernandina Beach, Hilliard, Folkston, Woodbine, Kings Bay Base, Homeland, Kings Ferry and High Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
